SELECT u.uid AS id, v.realname AS name,s.name AS schoolName,v.phone AS phone,u.sex AS sex, s.id AS schoolId FROM ts_user u INNER JOIN ts_user_verified v ON u.uid=v.uid INNER JOIN ts_db_school s ON v.sid=s.id INNER JOIN ts_user_group_link l ON u.uid=l.uid WHERE l.user_group_id=4 AND u.uname = #{uname} AND u.password = #{password}
